scrolling_boxes.description: PLAY's goal is to provide exposure to the most in-demand projects in Web 3.0.

subparagraph.title: The best part?
subparagraph.content: They are blockchain-enabled decentralized applications where crypto assets and data are user-owned. As such these assets can be moved across different virtual worlds. Breaking free of the stranglehold centralized platforms have had on you as a user.

boxes.title: Own the next big thing
boxes.description: There's a reason a certain tech giant changed its name to a Meta-verse reference. They see its potential and are betting big on its future; you can too. PLAY invests in gaming, infrastructure, and entertainment projects defining the metaverse on the Ethereum blockchain. Don’t worry about the future, own it.

boxes.title: More liquidity means less slippage pain
boxes.description: PLAY focuses on high-liquidity digital assets. This ensures maximum scalability while minimizing the annoyance caused by slippage. So entering and exiting positions can be as seamless as the metaverse.

boxes.title: Spend time experiencing the metaverse
boxes.description: Crypto is a fast-moving space with many areas of innovation. DeFi, DAOs, NFTs, and now the metaverse; it's way too time-consuming to keep track of daily. You have things to do. PLAY offers asset diversification while delegating research and due diligence to PieDAO. Let us do metaverse research you go experience it.

section_2.title: Token rebalancing Policy
section_2.description_1: The rebalancing of the PLAY token is rule-based. Under normal circumstances, PLAY holdings will be rebalanced:

points_1.description: At least once every 6 months to avoid obsolescence.
At most once per calendar month.

section_2.notes: Note: The inclusion of new assets won’t immediately trigger a rebalancing. The new asset allocation will be identified during the first available rebalancing.
section_2.description_2: Exceptions to the normal procedure can be triggered by the following:

points_2.description: Max allocation of the largest holding is greater than 50% for 7 consecutive days.
Max cumulative allocation of the top three holdings is greater than 80% for 7 consecutive days.

section_3.title: Rebalancing Procedure:
section_3.description: Based on the rules above any community member could call for a rebalancing of the PLAY token. The new allocation considered for rebalancing will also include the addition/removal of any assets voted on by the community.
